name: Yoobot Vs. Yoonot
storyline:
This flash game was made/sponsored by the British Heart Foundation in the late 2000s to help educate youth on how to have healthy habits.

In it you create a character (your Yoobot) by uploading your face and choosing from some characteristics, similar to The Sims. From your Yoobot, your Yoonot is made. The game consists of maintaining good eating habits by providing a cafeteria with many food options, some healthy, some not, and good exercise habits by having a dodgeball field, where you are pitted against your Yoonot.
summary: A flash game created by the British Heart Foundation in the late 2000s to help educate youth on how to have healthy habits.
